amendment.description: Amendment eliminates $3 million for Montana land acquisition and applies $2 million to the Idaho Snake river project and $1 million to the West Eugene, Oregon wetlands project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate $3,000,000 in land acquisition funds in the Bureau of Land Management for the Upper Missouri National Wild and Scenic River in Montana and to provide $2,000,000 for the Lower Snake/South Fork Snake River in Idaho and $1,000,000 for the West Eugene Wetlands project in Oregon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Regula amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
